member.name: M:BankNoteDispenser.defaultPrinter.Print(System.String)
member.summary: Prints the desired text using the System's default Font.
member.remarks: The text will automatically word wrap and it prints to the default printer.

member.name: M:BankNoteDispenser.defaultPrinter.Print(System.String,System.Drawing.Font)
member.summary: Prints the desired text using specified Font.
member.param: The font to use while printing.
member.remarks: The text will automatically word wrap and it prints to the default printer.

member.name: M:BankNoteDispenser.defaultPrinter.Print(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Prints the desired text using the System's default Font to the specified printer.
member.param: The name of the printer to print to.
member.remarks: The text will automatically word wrap. The printer name should be verfied that it is contained in PrinterSettings.InstalledPrinters

member.name: M:BankNoteDispenser.defaultPrinter.Print(System.String,System.Drawing.Font,System.String)
member.summary: Prints the desired text using the specified Font to the specified printer.
member.param: The font to use while printing.
The name of the printer to print to.
member.remarks: The text will automatically word wrap. The printer name should be verfied that it is contained in PrinterSettings.InstalledPrinters

member.name: F:BankNoteDispenser.Form1.WinsockStatuses.Listening
member.summary: The Winsock is listening (TCP for connections, UDP for data).

member.name: F:BankNoteDispenser.Form1.WinsockStatuses.ResolvingHost
member.summary: The Winsock is attempting the resolve the remote host.

member.name: F:BankNoteDispenser.Form1.WinsockStatuses.HostResolved
member.summary: The remote host has been resolved to IP address.

member.name: F:BankNoteDispenser.Form1.WinsockStatuses.Connecting
member.summary: The Winsock is attempting to connect to the remote host.

member.name: F:BankNoteDispenser.Form1.WinsockStatuses.Connected
member.summary: The Winsock is connected to a remote source (client or server).

member.name: F:BankNoteDispenser.Form1.WinsockStatuses.Closing
member.summary: The Winsock is attempting to close the connection.
